name: Two Souls (d0msen)
description:
Two Souls is Die Kerle's submission to GMTK 2021. The objective of the game is to move the two player characters to the stairs exit. The player characters move at the same time and have to be offset to reach their goal while avoiding holes and edges to fall.

A simple yet engaging puzzle game made by Die Kerle.

Special thanks to literally_someone, he made all the music and sounds.

Die Kerle are four hobby devs from Germany:

d0msen: Coding

Hanni: Coding

Titan: Graphics and Art

Bimmsen: Level Design and UI
